channel.title: Hides on 咸蛋超人
channel.description: Recent content in Hides on 咸蛋超人

item.title: FLPVS 审稿意见
item.author: hb_688@163.com (SuperEgg)
item.description: 审稿人1 弱点: The paper does not describe the attack model clearly other than to state that an adversary can make the traffic violate the network policy … by deleting or adding the forwarding rules of the compromised switches.未描述论文的attack model. (攻击者是怎

item.title: DO-IDS汉语版
item.author: hb_688@163.com (SuperEgg)
item.description: 摘要 随着智能工厂的空前发展，工业网络中需要更加频繁更改网络流量的转发策略。软件定义网络具有高灵活性和可编程性的优点，可动态地管理网络流量转发

item.title: 记录在数据平面选择流的过程
item.author: hb_688@163.com (SuperEgg)
item.description: 选择的流经过所有的交换机 控制器实时构造rule graph 获取所有的ingress rule（入度为0的规则），并依长度降序排序 对每一个ingress rule
